title: Champion not showing up.
body: I've played Braum in ranked more than 50 times, but he doesn't show up in my "Top Champions" list or "In Progress" list. Instead there are others that have been played less frequently. Bug?

replies.body:
if he is rank 5 he wont show, its the top 3 most played (score), then its in progress (ranks 1-4)

Say you have 5 lv 5 mastery champs, and no other champs with any points at all, it will only show 3 champs no more
It will show the highest 3 champions. or the highest champions that aren't level 5 in the Summoner profile.
